varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
Warning number. 657 is still valid.
There is gale warning for Daneborg, Kangikajik, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Nunarsuit, Narsalik and Meqquitsoq.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Tuesday the 8. July, 18 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1005 hPa, northeast of Iceland, is moving towards westnorthwest to Kangikajik, gradually filling some. A low, 9805 hPa, over Labrador Sea, is moving slowly towards north.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: North and northeast, 3 to 8 m/s, from this evening in western part variable, below 6 m/s. Mainly good visibility.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 3 m.

icedaneborg.name: Ice_Daneborg
icedaneborg.text: Old ice and thin first-year ice in the western and central part. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Gradually north and northwest, increasing up to gale 10 to 18 m/s, Tuesday gradually cyclonic variable, up to gale about 15 m/s, in southernmost part mainly southwest and south, 5 to 10 m/s. Rain and moderate to poor visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 3,5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: North and northeast, 5 to 10 m/s, this evening decreasing and this night variable, below 8 m/s, Tuesday southwest becoming south , 3 to 8 m/s. In northern part locally rain with moderate visibility, otherwise good visibility, apart from fog patches.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 2 m.
